results.description: You love a good puzzle. Creatives, developers, clients, budgets, deadlines…everything has its place. results.title: Director of Connections Strategy
results.description: What will you think of next? A fast changing media world needs new kinds of thinking. As technology drives integration, innovation and instant connections, the ways in which we find meaningful connections with consumers for our clients must keep pace. We know you agree. POP seeks a Director of Connections Strategy to lead the Connections practice and will report to the Chief Strategy Officer. This practice provides clients and internal partners with insight, inspiration, clarity and creativity …
